Voices of Summit 🗣️

Jun 13, 2018

  • civictech
  • episode
  • code for america
  • summit

Civic Tech Chat was at The Code for America Summit in Oakland California! This week we feature a series of 18 interviews with folks at the event. We talk about what they’re working on, what civic tech means to them, and critically… what brigade sticker they fancy.
